Description: Bifacial flint hoe: of triangular form, with a straight cutting edge. The cutting edge is worn and polished as a result of use, and the corners have been broken away.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton, 'Qau and Badari' I (London, 1927), 14 and pl.XXII, right.
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
